snippet: Two anonymous Twitter accounts used to release secretly recorded conversations implicating family and associates of Turkey's prime minister and senior government officials in a corruption scandal appeared on Sunday to have been blocked....

headline.print_headline: Turkey Twitter Accounts Appear Blocked After Erdogan Court Action
headline.main: Turkey Twitter Accounts Appear Blocked After Erdogan Court Action

lead_paragraph: Two anonymous Twitter accounts used to release secretly recorded conversations implicating family and associates of Turkey's prime minister and senior government officials in a corruption scandal appeared on Sunday to have been blocked.
